Articles.Content:
Hey guys. You may not know this about me, but I'm a Photoshop hobbyist at school, so I thought I'd share my masterpieces from the school year!

This is me IRL, and the bottom image is also what I've used for the "Put a Face to the Name" thread.

Current Facebook/Google account picture, kinda low quality:

And this is my true masterpiece, and definitely my favorite PS picture!

So what do you guys think? Would you like to see more of my work?
